name: Omar Alfawareh
intro_part_1: Hi, my name is Omar Alfawareh, and I am a software engineering student with a passion for web development and 2D game design. With a rich background in creating dynamic and user-friendly websites, I have honed my skills in both front-end and back-end technologies.
intro_part_2: My journey in software engineering is driven by an insatiable curiosity to explore new technologies and push the boundaries of digital innovation.
description: Hardworking software engineering student and web developer.

projects_descriptions.business: A website made for subscription-based business services. Coded in HTML and CSS.
projects_descriptions.seminar: A responsive website representing and describing a seminar held by a company.
projects_descriptions.unity: "Delivery Dash" is a 2D delivery game developed in Unity using C#.
projects_descriptions.login: Login Page made in React Js connected with Firebase.
